name: Poppy horror gametime
description:
Can you imagine arriving with your friends to have at a city on weekend to get playtime, and when you waking up to find yourself alone and with a bunch of mysterious people without knowing where your friends are?
So begins the scary poppy game that takes place in a mysterious city, full of secrets and enigmas to solve,
be careful, because popi dark will chase you though the street of this horror playtime city! look for places to hide and prevent him from capturing you too.
